basics.name: vmDnsPrefix
basics.label: VM DNS Prefix
basics.toolTip: This is the unique DNS name of the for the public IP for your VM

constraints.validationMessage: DNS name must be between 3 and 24 characters long, and can contain only numbers and lowercase letters.

basics.name: adminUsername
basics.label: Username
basics.toolTip: Admin username for the virtual machine.

basics.name: adminPassword
basics.toolTip: Admin password for the virtual machine.

constraints.validationMessage: The password must be between 6 and 72 characters long, and contain characters from at least 3 of the following groups: uppercase characters, lowercase characters, numbers, and special characters.

elements.name: vmSize
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: The size of the virtual machine to provision.
